name: Torn (itch) (Simojian)
description:
A simple game made for the GMTK game jam 2021.
In this world you play as two small dots collecting scribbles to complete words in a poem. However the number of times you can jump is limited between the two of you. Set out on this colorful journey to relax and hopefully have some fun!

Controls:

'A' & 'D' to move

'Space' to jump

'R' to restart

'Shift' to change perspective

Up and down to navigate menu and Enter to confirm
